alert.note: Alert for Dallam; Hartley (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Dallam and northwestern Hartley Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 744 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Texline to 8 miles east of Sedan to 14 miles south of Bueyeros. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Automated weather equipment. At 730 PM CDT, automated weather equipment recorded a 47 mph wind gust 2 miles north of Texline. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Texline and Ware. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
